website_summaries.verdict: One of the most affordable vitamin E supplements on the market.
pros: Every capsule contains 400 IU of vitamin E. Pills are small and easy to swallow
cons: Contains gelatin, so not appropriate for vegetarians
The capsules tend to stick together

customer_reviews.text: My name is Bryson and I rated this product based on my Mom's opinion on this product. She bought these pills and I don't know anything about them. You might be wondering why is my Mom not writing the review? That's because I wanted to rate something. So I don't know anything about this product. I do know that it gives you Vitamin E. My Mom rated everything 5 stars so I guess she recommends this product. Sorry if this was not helpful and you were probably wanting to know about this product. If you want to know about this product look at the other reviews. Sorry if this was not so helpful.
customer_reviews.author: nasha n.

customer_reviews.title: Pills are small and easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: Pills are small and easy to swallow. This is good value for a medium term supply of the most common dosage. My main issue is that the gelcaps tend to stick together. They were a solid mass when I first opened the bottle. I added a silica gel capsule from another medication, and the gelcaps are separating day by day. GNC should add a drying capsule and raise the price by a penny. With the silica gel, it's easy to coax a pill out, even with my chubby fingers.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rappel

customer_reviews.title: Great for homemade salves, serums, balms, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I use this vitamin E for my home recipes for things like face serum, eye serum, lip balm, salve, etc. Works well & my products have not spoiled when I have used this... some of them are over a year old. I WOULD purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: WiseCrew

customer_reviews.title: Synthetic Vitamin E
customer_reviews.text: Just realized this was a synthetic Vitamin E and not natural. Doctor said to take natural E because it is 3x more potent than synthetic. Will have to buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: TooManyHobbies

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for another brand
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for another brand that cost more. I was glad to find the same strength at a lesser cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The price is affordable.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I take one everyday & my hair really shines. I also just had surgery & I break open one everyday to put on the incision to help it from scarring.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hurst

customer_reviews.title: It helps
customer_reviews.text: I trust GNC products so it was an east choice to buy my first bottle of Vitamin E. I also hear it is good for skin.
customer_reviews.author: Athan from the valley

customer_reviews.title: Just buy in store in case they are busted
customer_reviews.text: Half the bottle was busted liquid pills . Waste of $$
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good for soap!
customer_reviews.text: I used these capsules for my homemade soap. Just popped a hole in them with a push pins and squeezed out the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: LadyJay

customer_reviews.title: Price good
customer_reviews.text: Product was affordable and the amount I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They do what they're supposed to. They're vitamins, what else can I say.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Graep

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: works great and the pill size is small so makes it easy to swallow
customer_reviews.author: ALAN

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin E’s
customer_reviews.text: I Love my vitamin E’s. I make sure that I don’t run out of them. I notice a big difference after being on them for a week.
customer_reviews.author: LiQuita

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I just started taking vitamin E these , these are easy to swallow and not a bad price
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great value and good quality products. Highly recommended. Fast and safe packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all!
customer_reviews.text: These are like any other vitamin E capsules I've seen around, but with a good price tag attached to it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: I try to buy only GNC supplements for their quality
customer_reviews.text: I try to buy only GNC supplements for their quality
customer_reviews.author: A. Noriega

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described and gel caps were easy to swallow
customer_reviews.author: katherine

customer_reviews.title: It is not the most healthy vitamin E This is ...
customer_reviews.text: It is not the most healthy vitamin E This is the syntetic one which has Several drawback I want you to return my money or send thenatural Vitamin E
customer_reviews.author: julio krasuk

customer_reviews.title: Expired or stored incorrectly
customer_reviews.text: Yuck! They were all stuck together. I had to throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Jaynie T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with my GNC vitamins I get. I take this every day!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Killion

customer_reviews.title: Rancid
customer_reviews.text: Product is rancid! All of the pills were stuck together as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gummy Wad
customer_reviews.text: No packet of absorbent or even some cotton inside the bottle so the capsules are Really Gummed Up and Stuck Together in a Wad. It is very annoying difficult to pry them apart. Junk. GNC used to mean quality. Forget it, I will pay more next time and upgrade to a better brand when I finish messing with this irritating product.
customer_reviews.author: HereComeDeJudge

customer_reviews.title: synthetic
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed to find this was synthetic, not real. I rated this as 2 because they did not say, I just assumed GNC was a good label. Wrong
customer_reviews.author: Dean J.

customer_reviews.title: Good price and fast delivery in this vit E
customer_reviews.text: I was happy the vitamin E 400 IU was a petite size - many are big . The item came quickly and in tact .
customer_reviews.author: Marie C

customer_reviews.title: great product. I use it in
customer_reviews.text: great product . I use it in , along with Shea butter and coconut butter to night cream for my face. I also use it on sunburn and other skin conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this again. Not using as an eatable but directly applying the oil from the capsule on the face. Can feel better! Nice. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Tejaswini Sugandhi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Many more capsules for the same amount I was paying in-store at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Lupus Boletus

customer_reviews.title: Im happy with this item
customer_reviews.text: Im happy with this item. These are gel caps and will stick together somewhat but they come apart easily.
customer_reviews.author: dianne carter

customer_reviews.title: Healthy bones
customer_reviews.text: Per my doctor I need to take one of these a day so I do on a regular basics. Seems to help with my bones as I have ostosprtis and need healthy bones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick hard outer layer
customer_reviews.text: Great to swallow, but difficult if you planned to open for liquid for scar reduction
customer_reviews.author: don's wife

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy this quality
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this quality, affordable vitamin E. Gyno suggested I take it for breast pain. So far it’s decreased the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: My doctor directed me to this. It's exactly what I needed at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: Hope to help me to care my skin, easy to swallow
customer_reviews.author: ninja

customer_reviews.title: Stuck like glue
customer_reviews.text: The capsules are all stuck together. None are broken just a pain to separate them.
customer_reviews.author: cptn2012
